monitor-jmx.name: Session/localhost//jpetstore/activeSessions
monitor-jmx.description: Number of active sessions at this moment

monitor-jmx.name: Session/localhost//jpetstore/rejectedSessions
monitor-jmx.description: Number of sessions tomcat rejected since last call due to maxActive being reached

monitor-virtual.name: Session/localhost//jpetstore/% rejectedSessions
monitor-virtual.description: Percentage of tomcat sessions rejected since last call due to maxActive being reached

monitor-jmx.name: Session/localhost//jpetstore/expiredSessions
monitor-jmx.description: Number of sessions that expired ( does not include explicit invalidations ) since last call

monitor-jmx.name: RequestProcessor/-ajp-bio-127.0.0.1-8009-/errorCount
monitor-jmx.description: Number of errors since last call

monitor-virtual.name: RequestProcessor/-ajp-bio-127.0.0.1-8009-/% errorCount
monitor-virtual.description: Percentage of errors since last call

monitor-jmx.name: RequestProcessor/-http-bio-8080-/errorCount
monitor-jmx.description: Number of errors since last call

monitor-virtual.name: RequestProcessor/-http-bio-8080-/% errorCount
monitor-virtual.description: Percentage of errors since last call

monitor-jmx.name: DataSource/localhost//jpetstore/javax.sql.DataSource/-jdbc/jpetstore1-/numActive
monitor-jmx.description: Number of active connections

monitor-jmx.name: DataSource/localhost//jpetstore/javax.sql.DataSource/-jdbc/jpetstore1-/numIdle
monitor-jmx.description: Number of idle connections

monitor-jmx.name: DataSource/localhost//jpetstore/javax.sql.DataSource/-jdbc/jpetstore1-/poolConfiguration
monitor-jmx.description: Textual description of datasource pool configuration

monitor-value-pattern.pattern: Minimum Idle Connections: @minIdle@, Maximum Idle Connections: @maxIdle@, Maximum Connections: @maxActive@

monitor-jmx.name: ThreadPool/-ajp-bio-127.0.0.1-8009-/currentThreadsBusy
monitor-jmx.description: Number of busy threads in the pool

monitor-virtual.name: ThreadPool/-ajp-bio-127.0.0.1-8009-/% currentThreadsBusy
monitor-virtual.description: Percentage of busy threads in the pool

monitor-jmx.name: ThreadPool/-ajp-bio-127.0.0.1-8009-/threadsConfiguration
monitor-jmx.description: Textual description of connection pool configuration

monitor-jmx.name: ThreadPool/-http-bio-8080-/currentThreadsBusy
monitor-jmx.description: Number of busy threads in the pool

monitor-virtual.name: ThreadPool/-http-bio-8080-/% currentThreadsBusy
monitor-virtual.description: Percentage of busy threads in the pool

monitor-jmx.name: ThreadPool/-http-bio-8080-/threadsConfiguration
monitor-jmx.description: Textual description of connection pool configuration

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Memory/Used
monitor-jmx.description: Represents the amount of memory currently used (in bytes)

monitor-virtual.name: VM/Memory/% Used
monitor-virtual.description: Represents the percentage amount of memory currently used

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Memory/Used
monitor-jmx.description: Used

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Memory/Max
monitor-jmx.description: Max

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Memory/Max
monitor-jmx.description: Represents the maximum amount of memory (in bytes) that can be used for memory management. Its value may be undefined. Maximum amount of memory may change over time if defined. Amount of used and committed memory will always be less than or equal to max if max is defined. A memory allocation may fail if it attempts to increase the used memory such that used > committed even if used <= max would still be true (for example, when the system is low on virtual memory).

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Garbage Collector/PS MarkSweep/CollectionTime
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the approximate accumulated collection elapsed time in milliseconds since last call

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Garbage Collector/PS Scavenge/CollectionTime
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the approximate accumulated collection elapsed time in milliseconds since last call

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Threads/ThreadCount
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the current number of live threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Threads/DaemonThreadCount
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the current number of live daemon threads

monitor-jmx.name: VM/Threads/PeakThreadCount
monitor-jmx.description: Returns the peak live thread count since the Java virtual machine started or peak was reset

monitor-jmx.name: Description/JVM
monitor-jmx.description: Textual description for the Java Runtime running Tomcat server

monitor-jmx.name: Description/Specification/Host
monitor-jmx.description: Textual description about operating system and server hardware

monitor-value-pattern.pattern: Physical Memory Size: @TotalPhysicalMemorySize@ / Swap Space Size: @TotalSwapSpaceSize@

threshold-comment.threshold-content: Too high number of rejected sessions
Too high number of rejected sessions
Too high number of active connections
Too high number of busy threads
Too high number of busy threads
Too high amount of memory used
Quantité élevée de mémoire en cours d'utilisation
Too high amount of memory used
Quantité élevée de mémoire en cours d'utilisation
